name: pizza-api
description: A pizza API, an example app from "Serverless applications with Claudia.js"

scripts.putRolePolicy: aws iam put-role-policy --role-name pizza-api-executor --policy-name PizzaApiDynamoDB --policy-document file://./roles/dynamodb.json
scripts.scan: aws dynamodb scan --table-name pizza-orders --region eu-central-1 --output json
